update post set blind_check = ? where post_no = ?

select * from ( select rownum rnum , a.* from ( select p.post_no post_no , c.category_name category_name , used_post_check , gp_post_check , post_name , mem_userid , post_enroll_date , post_views , ( select count(*) from report r where p.post_no = report_post_no ) report_count from post p join member m on m.mem_no = p.mem_no join category c on c.category_no = p.category_no left outer join group_purchase gp on p.post_no = gp.post_no left outer join usedprod up on p.post_no = up.post_no where blind_check = 'Y' order by p.post_no ) a ) where rnum between ? and ?

select * from ( select rownum rnum , a.* from ( select p.post_no post_no , c.category_name category_name , used_post_check , gp_post_check , post_name , mem_userid , post_enroll_date , post_views , blind_check from post p join member m on m.mem_no = p.mem_no join category c on c.category_no = p.category_no left outer join group_purchase gp on p.post_no = gp.post_no left outer join usedprod up on p.post_no = up.post_no where post_name like '%'|| nvl(?, '') ||'%' and c.category_name like '%'|| nvl(?, '') ||'%' and mem_userid like '%'|| nvl(?, '') ||'%' order by p.post_no ) a ) where rnum between ? and ?
